job.title: Senior Data Scientist - Work From Home
job.description:
About Lumen
Lumen is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work. With 450,000 route fiber miles serving customers in more than 60 countries, we deliver the fastest, most secure global platform for applications and data to help businesses, government and communities deliver amazing experiences. Learn more about Lumen’s network, edge cloud, security and communication and collaboration solutions and our purpose to further human progress through technology at news.lumen.com, LinkedIn: /lumentechnologies, Twitter: @lumentechco, Facebook: /lumentechnologies, Instagram: @lumentechnologies and YouTube: /lumentechnologies.
The Role
We are looking for an innovative, highly motivated, and proactive Sr Data Scientist to join our fast paced team. The Sr Data Scientist is instrumental to the analytics team. Working in a collaborative team environment creating data solutions; you will build,scale, validate, and maintain complex data solutions and models from structured and unstructured data sources. The Sr Data Scientist will also be involved with applications development and maintenance, data cleansing and research, metric creations, and technical document creations.
Roles And Responsibilities
The Main Responsibilities
Identify and source data needed to build analytic datasets in support of analysis and modeling activities
Work directly with multiple levels of management and various teams to source data sets needed
Perform ad hoc reporting and analyses projects as needed
Maintain technical documentation of data sets and data dictionaries.
Implement ongoing improvements to data sets and modeling activities.
Guide and collaborate with data visualization developers to support data needs creatively to provide appropriate insights to the business.
Building data repositories such as data warehouses, data lakes, and operational data stores, etc.
What We Look For In a Candidate
Master’s degree or its equivalent in Management Information Systems, Applied Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or related field of study
Strong understanding of analytic infrastructures/environments
3+ years of data engineering experience - data acquisition, cleansing, mining, exploratory analysis, data modeling, visualization, advanced SQL, and Big Data management/concepts
Experience with Oracle, SQL Server, SAP, and Python
Experience managing ETL processes and gateways.
Experience presenting to small and large groups of people, both technical experts and business executives
Ability to manage a portfolio of large analytics projects with multiple business stakeholders in a fast-moving, matrixed setting with high level of professionalism
A self-starter who is able to work both independently and as part of a team
Comfortable interacting professionally with a diverse group, executives, managers, data analysts, subject matter experts, and end users
Nice to have but not required experience building Power Bi models, intermediate DAX, and Power APPs
Advanced MS Access skills
Comfortable reaching out to domain experts to seek the knowledge you need
Experience in telecom industry a plus
